_header: Saint Mark in our gospel shows
Note: For the text in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4691
_description: Gospel for Easter Sunday in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
SAynte marke in oure gospell schawesAnd tellis vs wiþ semeli
                    sawes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor all þat euere we do þaim toTo criste him self
                    forsoþe we do
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Mark In vr gospel schewesAnd telleþ vs wiþ semely
                    sawes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor al þat euere we to hem doTo crist him self we don
                    hit to
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
In ille tempore Maria Magdalene et cetera (f.
                    185bc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Mark þis day oure godspelleOf cristes risyng wille vs
                    telle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…ffor what so euer to þem we doCrist him self we do it
                    to

CULDd11.First Lines:
…þe thridde marie gat salomasOf Anne þat hire thre
                    moder was…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…ffor al þat euere we to hem doto crist him self we don
                    him to
CULDd11.Note: Begins imperfectly due to missing folio 116.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint marke in our gospell schewesAnd tellys vs with semly
                    sawes…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…ffor all þat euer we do þame toTo cryst hym self
                    for soth we do

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Marke in oure gospell sc[haw]es& telles vs with semely
                    sawes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…for all þat euer we do þam toto Criste hym selfe
                    for soþth we do
MinULZ822.Attributed Title: In die festo pasche Secundum Matheum (f. 78v)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint marc in oure gospell schawisAnd tellyth vs ryght semely
                    sawys…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…ffor all þat we do þayn toTo crist hym self for
                    sothe we do
